segments.text: Hello , Mr . Hao . I am calling to tell you that you are not selected as our employee . Sorry .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Although I am a little shocked , I can deal with it pretty well . I didn't perform as well as I should have in the interview .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe . But you should not withdraw forever just because you failed once .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , thank you , I'll try if there were other chances .
segments.speaker: S2
